titleStmt.title: An Agreement prepared for the people of England and the places therewith incorporated, for a secure and present peace, upon grounds of common right, freedom and safety also, a declaration of the General Councel of Officers, concerning the same : with a petition of His Excellency and the said General Councel, presented therewith, Saturday, January 20,
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Partridge, R. Harford, G. Calvert, and G. Whittington,

notesStmt.note: "By the Appointment of the Generall Councel of Officers of the Army. Signed, John Rushvvorth, Sec."
"An agreement of the people" (p.7-26) is preceded by the petition of Lord Fairfax (p. 3-6).
The answer of the House of Commons to the petition, dated "Die Sabbathi; 20 Januarii, 1649": p. [1].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
